scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The papers contain a one page description of "Ship of Fools" signed by Porter; a section of the novel as it appeared in "Mademoiselle" with brief revisions by Porter; a tearsheet of proof from "Mademoiselle" with two autograph revisions and notes by Porter, and a note from Cyrilly Abels; and the covering envelope for the above addressed to Floyd Stovall.

did.unittitle: "Ship of Fools by Katherine Anne Porter" -- brief description typed on blue paper and signed by Miss Porter. [1958]

"Mlle passports," Mademoiselle, July issue. Autograph note to [Katherine Anne Porter]: "Picture from Arthur Long, as you suggested. Much love as always. Cyrilly [Abels]" Autograph note in Porter's hand: "Tear Sheet of Proof! K. A. P. / See what I mean, nothing right" with two autograph revisions to the text. 1958 June
"Ship of Fools" by Katherine Anne Porter, Mademoiselle. Autograph revisions in editor's note by Porter. 1958 July
